name: IOMemoryMap
desc: A reference to an existing block of memory in the current process or in a different process.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the memory map object.

items.name: - GetAddress
items.desc: Returns the address of the memory block.

items.name: - GetLength
items.desc: Returns the length of the memory block in bytes.

items.name: - GetOffset
items.desc: Returns the offset from the original start of the memory block.
